name: Law Office of Jeffrey D. Mapes Reviews

review.title: “Very Toxic Environment”
review.pros: Pros – There were no pros to this job.
review.cons: Cons – Inappropriate behavior and comments from management on a regular basis; as well as consistent, unwarranted disparagements.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Fixing arrogant and elitist personalities is probably not possible, but these people should at least get good advice on appropriate office behavior from someone who has run a successful business with low turnover.
